arcs.headline: Seamless OpenClaw Integration
arcs.summary: We launched a dedicated OpenClaw integration designed for instant agent deployment. A new one-line setup script now handles auto-installation and onboarding, connecting agents to our full model suite (including Kimi, Gemini, and Claude) within a polished, responsive interface.

one_liner: A big day for agents: we launched a seamless OpenClaw integration with one-line auto-setup and a fresh UI.
pr_summary:

- #8168: fix: OpenClaw branding — favicon, logos, fonts
